name: VeriX
description: VeriX is the first Telegram bot designed for the Nervos Network (CKB), a Bitcoin Layer 2 blockchain, aimed at enhancing community management for CKB-based projects. As a pioneering bot, VeriX enables group administrators to restrict member additions based on configurable criteria, such as holdings of CKB, xUDT tokens (CKB’s standard for fungible tokens), and NFT tokens. Leveraging CKB’s secure Layer 1 and UTXO-based Cell model, VeriX ensures trustless verification of asset ownership, fostering secure and exclusive communities within the Nervos ecosystem. By facilitating token-gated access, VeriX supports the growth of CKB projects, including DeFi and NFT initiatives, by ensuring only qualified participants join project-related Telegram groups.

highlights.title: First CKB-Related Telegram Bot
highlights.description: Pioneers Telegram-based community management for CKB projects by restricting group access based on CKB, xUDT, and NFT token holdings

highlights.title: Token-Gated Community Access
highlights.description: Allows group admins to set entry requirements using CKB, xUDT tokens, or NFTs, verified trustlessly via CKB’s Cell model for secure community management

highlights.title: RGB++ Compatibility
highlights.description: Likely integrates with the RGB++ protocol to verify NFT and token ownership, enabling seamless asset management and potential cross-chain interactions with Bitcoin

faq.q: I entered the wrong date of birth or chose the wrong wallet. What now?
faq.a: Leave the group, wait 15 minutes, and re‑join. You’ll receive a new verification link where you can submit the correct DOB or connect the right wallet. VeriX always checks your latest submission—previous data is discarded.

faq.q: Do rule changes kick existing members?
faq.a: No. When admins update /setage, /settoken, or /setamount, only future joins must meet the new requirements. Existing verified members stay unless they leave and come back later.

faq.q: I missed the 5‑minute window and got kicked. What now?
faq.a: Wait the full 15‑minute cooldown, then re‑join the group and finish the verification steps in one attempt. The timer restarts each time you successfully re‑enter the group.
